scripts.test:chromium:headless: pnpm run start:agent && playwright test --project=chromium ; pnpm run stop:agent
scripts.test:headless: pnpm run start:console && pnpm run test:setup:headless && test:chromium:headless ; pnpm run stop:console
scripts.test:chromium:ui: pnpm run start:agent && playwright test --ui --project=chromium ; pnpm run stop:agent
scripts.test:ui: pnpm run start:console && pnpm run test:setup:ui && test:chromium:ui ; pnpm run stop:console
scripts.test:debug: pnpm run start:console && playwright test --debug ; pnpm run stop:console
